section:
Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:Event
Event in the warehouse simulation GUI
Inherits from QMainWindow and represents the main window of the application Product
Product with a name, price, and quantity Report::ProductReport
Represents a report for a single product Report
Represents a report in the store simulation SalesReport
Extends the Report class to provide a report specifically for sales Simulation
Manages the overall department store simulation SimulationThread
Responsible for running the simulation in a separate thread Storage
Storage unit with a certain capacity Warehouse
Warehouse with storage capacity WarehouseReport
Extends the Report class to provide a report specifically for warehouse inventory
